sample.utils

Class LoadUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.utils.LoadUtil

  • public class LoadUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    LoadUtil class manages the reading and writing map information from or to a .map file. It also provides a format checking when reading a .map file to ensure the information can be correctly loaded into the map editor.
